user_query: I'm interested in exploring a trading dashboard that supports forex trading. It should provide real-time charts, performance metrics, and a wide range of technical analysis strategies. Can you recommend a tool that meets these requirements?

TaskList.description: Research available trading dashboard tools that support forex trading.
Gather specifications for each tool, including support for real-time charts and performance metrics.
Evaluate the range of technical analysis strategies offered by each dashboard tool.
Compile a list of recommended tools based on research and evaluations.
